title: Add new quote to backend

requirements.text: Add the quote 'If you wait faster, are you technically arriving sooner?' to the hardcoded quotes list in the backend `getQuotes` query in `backend/main.mo`.

quotes: Now add "If you wait faster, are you technically arriving sooner?"

acceptanceCriteria: The quote 'If you wait faster, are you technically arriving sooner?' appears in the array returned by the `getQuotes` query.
All previously existing quotes remain present and unchanged.
The backend compiles and deploys without errors.

constraints: Do not remove or modify any existing quotes.
nonGoals: Adding any other new quotes beyond the one specified.
